gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Warriors 97, Hornets 84
gameRecap.excerpt: The Warriors defeated the Hornets, 97-84. Stephen Curry recorded 15 points, five assists, and two rebounds for the Warriors, with Andrew Wiggins adding 14 points and three assists in the victory, Miles Bridges tallied 19 points, 11 rebounds, and three assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Warriors improve to 29-26, while the Hornets fall to 14-42.
